sentence.Network_en: Medical opinion varies on how many tablets it takes to overdose.
sentence.Network_cn: 医生对于服用多少药片算作过量意见不一。

entry.tran: （药物等的）过量；致死（或中毒）剂量
entry.def: If someone takes an overdose of a drug, they take more of it than is safe.

example.ex: Each year, one in 100 girls aged 15-19 takes an overdose...
example.tran: 每年，每100名15至19岁的少女中就有1位嗑药过量。

example.ex: In 1970, guitarist Jimi Hendrix died of a drug overdose.
example.tran: 1970年，吉他手吉米·亨德里克斯因服药过量而死亡。

entry.tran: 过量服用（药物）；过量吸食（毒品）
entry.def: If someone overdoses on a drug, they take more of it than is safe.

example.ex: Medical opinion varies on how many tablets it takes to overdose.
example.tran: 医生对于服用多少药片算作过量意见不一。

entry.def: You can refer to too much of something, especially something harmful, as an overdose.

example.ex: An overdose of sun, sea, sand and chlorine can give lighter hair a green tinge.
example.tran: 过量接触阳光、海水、沙粒和氯气会使浅色头发略呈绿色。

entry.def: You can say that someone overdoses on something if they have or do too much of it.

example.ex: The city, he concluded, had overdosed on design.
example.tran: 他的结论是这座城市过分重视规划设计了。

example.ex: ...tourists that tend to overdose on the regional specialities of goose, duck and Armagnac.
example.tran: 纵情享受鹅肉、鸭肉、阿马尼亚克酒等当地美食的游客

sentences.sentence: "The rock star overdosed and was found dead in his hotel room"

auth_sentence.res_content: Ironically, Elvis died of an overdose of prescription drugs.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"翻转"; 2. 表示"在……之上"; 3. 表示"过度,过分,超过"

stems_affixes.word_buile: over过度,过分,超过+all全部→adj.全部的, 全面的
over过度,过分,超过+correct改正→adj.矫枉过正的
over过度,过分,超过+crowded拥挤的→adj.挤满的
over超过+sea海+s复数→adv.海外 adj.外国的, 海外的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 紧张过度的,兴奋过度的
stems_affixes.word_buile: over过度,过分,超过+wrought=work工作→过度工作
over翻转+night夜, 夜晚→翻过一夜→一夜间→一下子;突然
over超过+sea海+s复数→adv.海外 adj.外国的, 海外的
over翻转+haul拉→拉过去检修
over翻转+throw扔→扔翻了→推翻
over翻转+turn转→翻转
over在……之上+bridge桥→上面的桥→天桥
over在……之上+coat衣服→在衣服上的衣服→外套
over过度,过分,超过+dose剂量→n.药物过量
over过度,过分,超过+production生产→n.生产过度
over过度,过分,超过+study学习→n.用功过度
over过度,过分,超过+work工作→n.过度劳累
over在……之上+lap交叉→[大腿]交叉→重叠
over过度,过分,超过+flow流动→流出来了,溢出
over翻转+take拿,占领→v.袭击,压倒
over在……之上+come来→来到上面→战胜
over在……之上+hang悬挂→v.悬于……之上, 悬垂
over在……之上+look看→在上面看→俯视,引申为疏忽
over在……之上+ride骑→骑在上面→推翻[下面的]
over在……之上+whelm推翻;淹没→翻过来→压倒
over过度,过分,超过+act演出→v.表演过火

sentences.en: He took an overdose and was in the hospital for weeks.
sentences.cn: 他用药过量, 在医院住了好几个星期。
